verses.roman:
mukhe-netre haya nānā-bhāvera udgāra
ei kāntā-bhāvera nāma 'lalita'-alaṅkāra

synonyms: mukhe—on the mouth; netre—on the eyes; haya—there are; nānā-bhāvera—of various ecstasies; udgāra—the awakening; ei—this; kāntā-bhāvera—of the condition of the female; nāma—the name; lalita—of lalita; alaṅkāra—the ornament.
translation: "When there is an awakening of various ecstatic features on Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī's face and in Her eyes, the lalita ornaments are manifest.
